about.title: About SkillLens AI
about.subtitle: Transforming recruitment with advanced artificial intelligence and cutting-edge technology.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To revolutionize the talent selection process through artificial intelligence, providing tools that enable companies to make more objective, efficient, and accurate hiring decisions.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading platform in automated candidate evaluation, eliminating bias and democratizing access to high-quality selection processes for companies of all sizes.

ai.title: Advanced Artificial Intelligence
ai.description: State-of-the-art algorithms for deep CV analysis and intelligent extraction of relevant information.

precision.title: Precise Evaluation
precision.description: Objective comparison based on specific job criteria, eliminating human bias in initial selection.

speed.title: Exceptional Speed
speed.description: Fast processing that reduces selection time by 80%, significantly accelerating your hiring process.

security.title: Guaranteed Security
security.description: Enterprise-level data protection with advanced encryption and privacy regulation compliance.

about.valuesSubtitle: The principles that guide our work and development

innovation.title: Constant Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously seek new ways to improve and optimize selection processes through cutting-edge technology.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We work closely with our clients to understand their needs and develop customized solutions.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We commit to delivering the highest quality products that exceed our users' expectations.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: We design intuitive and accessible tools that can be used by teams of any size and technical experience.

raona.title: Developed by Raona Enginyers
raona.description: We are an engineering company specialized in innovative technological solutions. With years of experience in software development and technology consulting, we firmly believe in the power of technology to transform and improve business processes.
